summary: After a career criminal is recaptured and knows he faces the guillotine, he offers to exchange his life for 100 hostages slated for execution by the Nazis.
cast: Errol Flynn|Paul Lukas|Lucile Watson|Faye Emerson|James Flavin|Douglass Dumbrille|Dennis Hoey|Sheldon Leonard|Odette Myrtil|Francis Pierlot|Jean Sullivan|Per Aabel|Felix Basch|Frederic Brunn|Nora Bush|James Carlisle|Wallis Clark|Pedro de Cordoba|Fred Cordova|Armand Cortes|Paul Cristo|Jean Del Val|Fernanda Eliscu|Robert Fischer|Joel Friedkin|Michael Gaddis|Creighton Hale|Carl Harbaugh|Oscar 'Dutch' Hendrian|George Hoagland|Robert Emmett Keane|Victor Kilian|Ethan Laidlaw|Connie Leon|George Magrill|George Meader|Harry Hays Morgan|Alfred Paix|Paul Panzer|Erskine Sanford|Hans Schumm|Mary Servoss|Art Smith|Zina Torchina|Ivan Triesault|Joyce Tucker|Albert Van Antwerp|Bobby Walberg
title: Gloria incierta
